member.name: T:Common.My.MyWebExtension
member.summary: Module used to define the properties that are available in the My Namespace for Web projects.

member.name: P:Common.My.MyWebExtension.Computer
member.summary: Returns information about the host computer.

member.name: P:Common.My.MyWebExtension.User
member.summary: Returns information for the current Web user.

member.name: M:Common.Actions.Main.GetRepeaterAction(System.Int32)
member.summary: Currently the only allowed repeater action is custom code. This method will need to be updated if other Main are allowed.

member.name: M:Common.General.Actions.GetRepeaterAction(System.Int32)
member.summary: Currently the only allowed repeater action is custom code. This method will need to be updated if other actions are allowed.

member.name: M:Common.General.Pages.GetFirstPage(System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if a page has already been created for this project. If no pages exist, creates a page. Then returns the first page's ID.
